channel.title: Impact - 464 | Fullscreen | OpenGL HD | Bank tabs | Achievements
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://www.impact-rs.com/forums/public/style_images/8_impactlogo.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][URL=http://"http://www.impact-rs.com/"]Home[/URL] || [URL=http://"http://www.impact-rs.com/forums/"]Forums[/URL] | | [URL=http://"http://www.impact-rs.com/play/index.html"]Play[/URL] | | [URL=http://"http://www.impact-rs.com/vote"]Vote[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Information[/U][/FONT][/SIZE] Impact is a Runescape private server that has been in development for the past few years by passionate and motivated developers. Our goal is to provide an enjoyable private server experience for all types of players, surpassing the typical expectations. We know that this whole thing wouldn't work without you, the players, which is why we urge you to express your thoughts on the server and forum! What do you like? What don't you like? What would you like to see more of? And more importantly, what new content would you like to see? Your opinion is extremely valuable to us and will determine the focus our future updates.
[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Features[/U][/FONT][/SIZE] Well maintained community Active community only six days after release ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5uVT/8070a434fd.png"]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5qDG/a6c733f37f.png"]Pic[/URL]) Constant updates Custom donation page integrated with the forums ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5qtC/5aef753523.png"]Pic[/URL]) Client with the ability to choose your gameplay ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5qRp/bfe9b33f7b.png"]Pic[/URL]) Over 10 settings to toggle within the client Quest, Player, and achievements tabs all fully functionally Well put together teleportation system Clan chat system Shooting stars Full screen Bank tabs Over 7 minigames to enjoy with friends or your self (Pest control, warriors guild, barrows, duel arena and more) Over 7 bosses to challenge (Corp, Barrelchest, Kbd, Kq and more) Over 5 dungeons with monsters to be slain Vote system Great xp rates to keep players entertained Iron man mode with proper interface
[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Skills[/U][/FONT][/SIZE] Combat related skills Fletching ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xEO/3963e3d23f.png"]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xGS/8d7a887fcb.png"]Pic[/URL]) Woodcutting ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xJy/7c60757ffe.png"]Pic[/URL]) Firemaking ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xMT/8e1896bbcf.png"]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xLj/b6a9d2eb4a.png"]Pic[/URL] Fishing ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xRB/e27085c798.png"]Pic[/URL] Cooking ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xVU/82e650389b.png"]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5xXU/a5820a8889.png"]Pic[/URL]) Mining ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5ypI/8e546a47dc.png"]Pic[/URL]) Smithing ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5yAN/b2f4ee9021.png"]Pic[/URL] Herblore ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5z8v/60f19a513f.png"]Pic[/URL] Agility ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5zf2/fb9d67d043.png"]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5sSD/090981bc16.png"]Pic[/URL]) Farming Runecrafting Crafting ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5yfU/1b5799c3a6.png"]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5ycZ/2d95f10acc.png"]Pic[/URL] Thieving ([URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5zjh/32448a8497.png"]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://"http://puu.sh/h5ziY/131ac995a2.png"]Pic[/URL])
[SPOILER=General Media] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5t3Q/03ce8c648c.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5rOx/9867cafe97.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5rDF/abe64b28d1.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5rVP/9614298e6b.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5sfj/d571093215.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5sDb/aba88aa27c.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5r3v/cb33919b59.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5sno/d6b07d4248.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5t1a/3382d85e6d.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h5ra1/1f277abd18.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Player Media] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/29e0pat.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/25ksktk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/kd7hmw.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
Hope to see you guys online! [/CENTER]

item.title: Impact - 464 | Fullscreen | OpenGL HD | Bank tabs | Achievements
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You’re not showing much that would attract me to it. From what I can say though is that this feels like one of those servers that would be fun for perhaps a week and then after, bore me. I don’t know though, I could be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Impact - 464 | Fullscreen | OpenGL HD | Bank tabs | Achievements
item.dc:creator: @Flight Flight
item.description:
@Flight wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=4][URL=http://“http://www.impact-rs.com/”]Home[/URL] || [URL=http://“http://www.impact-rs.com/forums/”]Forums[/URL] | | [URL=http://“http://www.impact-rs.com/play/index.html”]Play[/URL] | | [URL=http://“http://www.impact-rs.com/vote”]Vote[/URL][/SIZE]

[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Information[/U][/FONT][/SIZE]
Impact is a Runescape private server that has been in development for the past few years by passionate and motivated developers. Our goal is to provide an enjoyable private server experience for all types of players, surpassing the typical expectations. We know that this whole thing wouldn’t work without you, the players, which is why we urge you to express your thoughts on the server and forum! What do you like? What don’t you like? What would you like to see more of? And more importantly, what new content would you like to see? Your opinion is extremely valuable to us and will determine the focus our future updates.

[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Features[/U][/FONT][/SIZE]
Well maintained community
Active community only six days after release ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5uVT/8070a434fd.png”]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5qDG/a6c733f37f.png”]Pic[/URL])
Constant updates
Custom donation page integrated with the forums ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5qtC/5aef753523.png”]Pic[/URL])
Client with the ability to choose your gameplay ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5qRp/bfe9b33f7b.png”]Pic[/URL])
Over 10 settings to toggle within the client
Quest, Player, and achievements tabs all fully functionally
Well put together teleportation system
Clan chat system
Shooting stars
Full screen
Bank tabs
Over 7 minigames to enjoy with friends or your self (Pest control, warriors guild, barrows, duel arena and more)
Over 7 bosses to challenge (Corp, Barrelchest, Kbd, Kq and more)
Over 5 dungeons with monsters to be slain
Vote system
Great xp rates to keep players entertained
Iron man mode with proper interface

[SIZE=6][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][U]Skills[/U][/FONT][/SIZE]
Combat related skills
Fletching ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xEO/3963e3d23f.png”]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xGS/8d7a887fcb.png”]Pic[/URL])
Woodcutting ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xJy/7c60757ffe.png”]Pic[/URL])
Firemaking ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xMT/8e1896bbcf.png”]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xLj/b6a9d2eb4a.png”]Pic[/URL]
Fishing ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xRB/e27085c798.png”]Pic[/URL]
Cooking ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xVU/82e650389b.png”]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5xXU/a5820a8889.png”]Pic[/URL])
Mining ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5ypI/8e546a47dc.png”]Pic[/URL])
Smithing ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5yAN/b2f4ee9021.png”]Pic[/URL]
Herblore ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5z8v/60f19a513f.png”]Pic[/URL]
Agility ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5zf2/fb9d67d043.png”]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5sSD/090981bc16.png”]Pic[/URL])
Farming
Runecrafting
Crafting ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5yfU/1b5799c3a6.png”]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5ycZ/2d95f10acc.png”]Pic[/URL]
Thieving ([URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5zjh/32448a8497.png”]Pic[/URL], [URL=http://“http://puu.sh/h5ziY/131ac995a2.png”]Pic[/URL])

[SPOILER=General Media]










[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Player Media]



[/SPOILER]

Hope to see you guys online!
[/CENTER]
